document_data.caption: A map showing Lake Midai in Bloodstone Barony.
document_data.name: Lake Midai
document_data.mainbody: '''Lake Midai''' was a small but vital freshwater lake found in [[Bloodstone Barony]].
document_data.Geography: Lake Midai sat at the foot of the [[Galena Mountains]] on the western end of the barony.
document_data.Description: The lake stretched from north to south for several miles, but was only a mile wide. Though small, the lake was incredibly deep.
document_data.Activities: The plunging depths of Lake Midai provided ample fishing opportunities for the people of [[Bloodstone Village]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* Bloodstone Village
* [[Beaumaris River]]
* [[Tower of the Sage]]
